VENUE_MEMO, VENUE_CROWD, VENUE_MOOD, VENUE_DEPT, VENUE_REMARK, VENUE_PANORAMA
mapper.select:
SELECT
,
,ct.tag_name FROM cms_venue v
LEFT JOIN cms_tag ct ON FIND_IN_SET(ct.tag_id, v.VENUE_TYPE)
WHERE 1=1
AND v.VENUE_IS_DEL = 1 AND v.VENUE_STATE = 6
AND v.VENUE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') limit #{limit}

SELECT
,
,ct.tag_name FROM
cms_venue v
LEFT JOIN cms_tag ct ON FIND_IN_SET(ct.tag_id, v.VENUE_TYPE)
WHERE 1=1
AND v.VENUE_IS_DEL = 1 AND v.VENUE_STATE = 6
AND v.VENUE_ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
limit #{limit}

VENUE_CREATE_TIME = #{venueCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VENUE_UPDATE_TIME = #{venueUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VENUE_CREATE_USER = #{venueCreateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VENUE_UPDATE_USER = #{venueUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
